name: Rubik's Cube
description: Randomize the cube with a sequence of twists to start a fresh solving challenge.

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: A classic 3x3 grid game where players aim to align three Xs or Os in a row.

name: Sudoku
description: A number puzzle where you fill a 9x9 grid so each row, column, and box contains 1â€“9.
Slide and combine numbered tiles to reach the elusive 2048 tile.

name: Sliding Puzzel
description: Rearrange shuffled tiles by sliding them into the correct order.

name: Match the card
description: Flip and match pairs of cards using memory and logic.

name: Snake
description: Control a growing snake to eat food while avoiding walls and itself.
